text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Jevha tumacyajavala imana rakhanarya striya desatyaga karuna yetila, tevha tumhi tyanci pariksa gheta ja. Vastutah tyancya imanasa cangalya prakare jananara tara allahaca ahe, parantu jara tya tumhala imana rakhanarya vatatila, tara maga tumhi tyanna kaphirankade parata pathavu naka. Ya tyancyasathi halala (vaidha) nahita ani na te yancyasathi halala aheta, ani jo kahi kharca tya kaphiranni kela asela, to tyanna de'una taka, tya striyanna tyanca mahara ada karuna tyacyasi vivaha karuna ghenyata tumacyavara kasalahi gunha nahi. Ani kaphira striyancya vivahabandhanasa apalya kabjata thevu naka ani jo kahi kharca tumhi kela asela to maguna ghya ani jo kahi kharca tya kaphiranni kela asela, to tyannihi maguna ghyava. Ha allahaca phaisala ahe, jo tumacya daramyana karita ahe ani allaha jananara (ani) hikamata balaganara ahe
